element.name: Armshield
element.source: Hex's Notes on Magic and Combat

description.p: A armshield is made from wood or metal and is strapped to the offhand forearm. Wielding a armshield increases your Armor Class by 1. Wearing a armshield will cause you to lose proficiency bonus with two handed weapons. You can benefit from only one armshield at a time.

element.name: Requip Armor
element.source: Hex's Notes on Magic and Combat

description.p: As an action you can summon or dismiss this armor to an extradimensional space. When summoned, the armor can be dropped on the ground or equipped to you or a target within 5 ft. This can be done as part of the same action used to summon or dismiss another item in a similar way.
